title: Genetically Altered
description: An unidentified agency has forced Kelsey's entire family into hiding around the globe, after they were all accidentally exposed to chemicals at a family reunion. Years later, they are all still being hunted down. Many of them are able to remain safe and one step ahead, thanks to the incredible abilities that each of them have gained after the chemicals genetically altered them. Because of the constant hiding, many of the family members have lost touch with each other. When Kelsey finds her favorite uncle and cousins, she also finds herself fighting for her life.Read a sample here! https://play.google.com/books/reader?...After you read the book, take the quiz! https://www.goodreads.com/quizzes/386...
author: Tracie Molton
